product.name: 3 Pack White Wood Pendant Lighting for Kitchen Island Nordic Pendant Light Minimalist Hanging Light for Dining Room Kitchen Sink Bar Bedroom
product.description:
Simple, elegant, modern
Simple, elegant, modern
The blue color has returned to the public eye as "New Grey". NIEADU's blue-grey colors provide a sense of tranquility.
Plug in wall light, install it anywhere you want.
product.bullet_points:
• Suitable for Multiple Style Room:This white mini pendant light with wood contains a white aluminum shade and a logwood top. It's a perfect hanging pendant light for modern style and minimalist styles
• Aluminium Lampshade:The shade of this nordic small pendant light is made of high-quality aluminum, has fast heat dissipation, and will never be rusty or outdated. The light fixture can be used as long as you want
• Adjustable Hanging Height:Lampshade Size: 8.66'' x 5.51'' , and the ceiling canopy base is 4.72'', The adjustable cord length is up to 37.4'', and you can adjust it to meet your lighting needs
• Easy to Install Light Fixture:This modern minimalist white pendant light comes with instructions and mounting hardware for easy installation. The light fixture is also suitable for flat and sloping ceilings. We recommended installing it by a professional electrician. Note: one pendant light in the package
• E26 Base Bulbs:The pendant lighting fixture is compatible with Edison bulbs, LED bulbs, incandescent, etc. Bulb base E26, Max 40W It could be dimmable if you install the dimmable bulb and dimmer (Bulbs and dimmer both not included)
